patthana15.86:4.1: Saraṇo anuppanno dhammo nasaraṇassa naanuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:4.2: Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye cattāri.
patthana15.86:5.1: Araṇo uppādī dhammo naaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:5.2: Araṇo uppādī dhammo nasaraṇassa nauppādissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.86:5.3: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, upanissaye dve.
